atk-s0305a:14_1: Mahāvaggassa paṭhame pubbaṅgamāti sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti dvīhākārehi pubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0305a:14_4: Anvadeva ahirikaṃ anottappanti sā panesā yadetaṃ alajjanākārasaṇṭhikaṃ ahirikaṃ,
atk-s0305a:14_12: Iti imāni aṭṭhapi akusaladhammasamāpattiyā micchattaaṅgāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:14_13: Tāni pana na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a:15_1: Yadā hi diṭṭhisampayuttacittaṃ kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:15_2: tadā micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchākammantoti cha aṅgāni honti.
atk-s0305a:15_6: tadā micchākammantaṭṭhāne micchāvācāya saddhiṃ tāneva cha vā pañca vā.
atk-s0305a:15_7: Ayaṃ ājīvo nāma kuppamāno kāyavacīdvāresuyeva aññatarasmiṃ kuppati,
atk-s0305a:15_9: Tasmā yadā ājīvasīsena tāneva cittāni kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0305a:15_11: tathā vacīkammanti micchājīvassa vasena tāneva cha vā pañca vā.
atk-s0305a:15_12: Yadā pana viññattiṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvā tāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:15_14: micchāsaṅkappādivasena cattāri vā hontīti evaṃ na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a:16_1: Ihāpi sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti dvīhākārehi pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:16_12: tāni lokiyamaggakkhaṇe na ekato sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a:17_0: Tattha yo evaṃ vadeyya “yasmā majjhimanikāyamhi mahāsaḷāyatanikasutte ‘yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi,
atk-s0305a:17_10: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pañcaṅgikopi lokuttaramaggo hotī”ti so vattabbo –
atk-s0305a:17_11: tasmiṃyeva sutte “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti idaṃ kasmā na passasi?
atk-s0305a:17_14: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya hi parisuddhāni kāyakammādīni lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe atiparisuddhāni hontīti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0305a:18_0: Yampi abhidhamme vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti,
atk-s0305a:18_2: Yasmiñhi kāle micchākammantaṃ pahāya sammākammantaṃ pūreti,
atk-s0305a:18_3: tasmiṃ kāle micchāvācā vā micchājīvo vā na hoti,
atk-s0305a:18_4: diṭṭhi saṅkappo vāyāmo sati samādhīti imesuyeva pañcasu kārakaṅgesu sammākammanto pūrati.
atk-s0305a:18_7: Iti imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:18_12: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:18_13: ayaṃ bhikkhave sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaramaggo”ti.
atk-s0305a:18_14: Evaṃ pana mahācattālīsakasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu sammākammantādīnañca lokuttaramaggassa aṅgabhāvasiddhito
atk-s0305a:18_16: Imasmiṃ sutte ayaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo lokiyalokuttaramissakova kathito.
atk-s0305a:20_1: Tatiye sakalamidaṃ bhanteti ānandatthero sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ appattatāya sakalampi maggabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0305a:20_3: dhammasenāpati pana sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthake ṭhitattā aññāsi,
atk-s0305a:22_1: Catutthe sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathenāti sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0305a:22_2: So kira sabbo sacakkapañjarakubbaro rajataparikkhitto hoti.
atk-s0305a:22_6: Tattha yodharatho caturassasaṇṭhāno hoti nātimahā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā janānaṃ gahaṇasamattho.
atk-s0305a:22_7: Alaṅkāraratho mahā hoti dīghato dīgho puthulato puthulo ca,
atk-s0305a:22_8: tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti evaṃ aṭṭha vā dasa vā sukheneva ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti.
atk-s0305a:23_0: Setā sudaṃ assāti tā vaḷavā pakatiyā setavaṇṇāva.
atk-s0305a:23_2: Seto rathoti rathopi vuttanayeneva rajataparikkhittattā tattha tattha dantakammakhacitattā ca setova.
atk-s0305a:23_3: Setaparivāroti yathā aññe rathā sīhacammaparivārāpi honti,
atk-s0305a:24_0: Setaṃ chattanti rathamajjhe ussāpitachattampi setameva ahosi.
atk-s0305a:24_1: Setaṃ uṇhīsanti aṭṭhaṅgulavitthāro rajatamayo uṇhīsapaṭṭo seto.
atk-s0305a:24_5: Setā upāhanāti upāhanā nāma maggāruḷhassa vā honti aṭaviṃ vā pavisantassa.
atk-s0305a:24_7: tenassa tadanucchaviko rajatapaṭisevito pādālaṅkāro nāma esa evaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:24_12: dasasu aṅgulīsu aṅgulimuddikā kaṇṇesu kuṇḍalānīti evamādi alaṅkāropissa rajatamayova ahosi.
atk-s0305a:25_2: so kira channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti –
atk-s0305a:25_3: “ito ettakehi divasehi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatī”ti puretarameva ghosanā kayirati.
atk-s0305a:25_4: Taṃ sutvā ye nagarato na pakkantā,
atk-s0305a:25_9: tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi vippakiritvā puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0305a:25_10: ṭhapetvā kadaliyo ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0305a:26_0: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0305a:26_1: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti.
atk-s0305a:26_2: Tato mahājanassa sannipātatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva taruṇadārakānaṃ phalāphalāni vikiranti,
atk-s0305a:26_7: Atha brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā nagaraṃ anuvicarati.
atk-s0305a:26_8: Puññavantā manussā ekabhūmikādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti.
atk-s0305a:26_9: Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho hoti.
atk-s0305a:27_0: Tamenaṃ jano disvāti mahājano taṃ rathaṃ disvā.
atk-s0305a:27_2: Brahmaṃ vata bho yānanti seṭṭhayānasadisaṃ vata bho yānanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a:27_4: manussā nāma vaṇṇabhāṇakānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attano dārikānaṃ vaṇṇagītaṃ gāyāpenti “abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo mahaddhano mahābhogo”ti,
atk-s0305a:27_5: na ca tena vaṇṇabhaṇanamattena abhirūpā vā honti mahaddhanā vā,
atk-s0305a:27_7: “brahmaṃ vata bho yāna”nti kiñcāpi evaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-s0305a:27_8: na panetaṃ yānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamatteneva brahmayānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:27_10: Paramatthena pana imasseva kho etaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0305a:27_13: iminā ca ariyā nibbānaṃ yantīti brahmayānaṃ itipi,
atk-s0305a:27_15: anuttarattā kilesasaṅgāmassa ca vijitattā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayo itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:28_1: Tattha rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpeti pariyosānaṃ gacchati nipphajjatīti rāgavinayapariyosānā.
atk-s0305a:29_0: Yassa saddhā ca paññā cāti yassa ariyamaggayānassa saddhānusārivasena saddhā,
atk-s0305a:29_1: dhammānusārivasena paññāti ime dve dhammā sadā dhuraṃ yuttā,
atk-s0305a:29_3: Hirī īsāti attanā saddhiṃ adhiviṭṭhena bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānena ottappena saddhiṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī yassa maggarathassa īsā.
atk-s0305a:29_5: Yathā hi rathassa vākādimayaṃ yottaṃ goṇe ekābaddhe karoti ekasaṅgahite,
atk-s0305a:29_7: lokuttaravipassanācittaṃ atirekasaṭṭhi kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahe karoti.
atk-s0305a:29_10: Yathā hi rathassa ārakkho sārathi nāma yoggiyo.
atk-s0305a:29_11: Dhuraṃ vāheti yojeti akkhaṃ abbhañjati rathaṃ peseti rathayuttake nibbisevane karoti,
atk-s0305a:29_13: Ayañhi ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ceva kusalākusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesatīti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:30_2: Jhānakkhoti vipassanāsampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena jhānamayaakkho.
atk-s0305a:30_4: kāyikacetasikasaṅkhātāni dve vīriyāni assa cakkānīti attho.
atk-s0305a:30_6: unnatonatākārassa abhāvena dvinnampi yugapadesānaṃ samatāti attho.
atk-s0305a:30_7: Ayañhi tatramajjhattupekkhā cittuppādassa līnuddhaccabhāvaṃ haritvā payogamajjhatte cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-s0305a:30_9: Anicchā parivāraṇanti bāhirakarathassa sīhacammādīni viya imassāpi ariyamaggarathassa alobhasaṅkhātā anicchā parivāraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:31_3: Yassa āvudhanti yassa ariyamaggarathe ṭhitassa kulaputtassa etaṃ pañcavidhaṃ āvudhaṃ.
atk-s0305a:31_4: Yathā hi rathe ṭhito pañcahi āvudhehi sapatte vijjhati,
atk-s0305a:31_5: evaṃ yogāvacaropi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramaggarathe ṭhito mettāya dosaṃ vijjhati,
atk-s0305a:31_13: Yathā hi rathe ṭhito rathiko paṭimukkacammo āgatāgate sare khamati,
atk-s0305a:31_15: evaṃ adhivāsanakkhantisamannāgato bhikkhu āgatāgate vacanapathe khamati,
atk-s0305a:31_18: Yogakkhemāya vattatīti catūhi yogehi khemāya nibbānāya vattati,
atk-s0305a:32_0: Etadattani sambhūtanti etaṃ maggayānaṃ attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attani sambhūtaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:32_2: Niyyanti dhīrā lokamhāti yesaṃ etaṃ yānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0305a:32_3: te dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:32_5: Jayaṃ jayanti rāgādayo sapatte jinantā jinantā.
atk-s0305a:34_3: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhañceva missakamaggo ca kathito.
atk-s0305a:36_1: Sattame nibbānadhātuyā kho etaṃ bhikkhu adhivacananti asaṅkhatāya amatāya nibbānadhātuyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:36_2: Āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatīti apica tena rāgādivinayena āsavānaṃ khayotipi vuccati.
atk-s0305a:36_5: Etadavocāti “satthārā nibbānadhātūti vadantena amataṃ nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0305a:36_7: Taṃ kathāpessāmī”ti anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a:38_1: Aṭṭhame katamā ca bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhīti ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvā puna aparena pariyāyena vibhajitukāmo idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:38_2: Tattha dukkhe ñāṇanti savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇavasena catūhākārehi uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a:38_4: Sesesu pana dvīsu sammasanassa abhāvā tividhameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:39_6: “katame pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā nayena vitthārena ca ācariyasantike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento yogāvacaro kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:39_9: maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti evaṃ savaneneva kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:39_10: So evaṃ karonto cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0305a:41_7: Itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya payogo bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya avīciphusanatthaṃ pādapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:41_8: viya satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti.
atk-s0305a:41_10: Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena idaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:41_11: Paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:42_5: Sabbepi ca te nekkhammasaṅkappādayo kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāviramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a:42_6: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a:43_0: Musāvādā veramaṇīādayopi musāvādādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a:43_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a:44_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī ādayopi pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a:44_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya akiriyato padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a:45_4: Sammājīvopi kuhanādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā.
atk-s0305a:45_5: Maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesu uppannāya micchājīvadussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a:46_0: Anuppannānanti ekasmiṃ bhave tathārūpe vā ārammaṇe attano na uppannānaṃ,
atk-s0305a:46_2: “aho vata me evarūpā pāpakā dhammā na uppajjeyyu”nti evaṃ anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya.
atk-s0305a:46_3: Chandanti tesaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādakapaṭipattisādhakaṃ vīriyacchandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0305a:46_6: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:46_7: Padahatīti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti padhānaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0305a:46_9: Idāni tādise na uppādessāmīti tesaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0305a:47_7: Ayampi sammāvāyāmo anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādicittanānattā pubbabhāge nānā.
atk-s0305a:47_8: Maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ekameva kusalavīriyaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:48_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekā sati uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:49_4: dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā vā dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikā vā.
atk-s0305a:49_6: dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā.
atk-s0305a:49_7: Evaṃ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-s0305a:50_1: Pādakajjhānaniyamena hi paṭhamajjhānalābhino paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti,
atk-s0305a:50_3: Dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno dutiyajjhāniko hoti,
atk-s0305a:50_8: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-s0305a:51_4: Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato vuṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā arūpasamāpattiṃ bhāvetvā so āruppe uppanno,
atk-s0305a:51_11: Tesaṃ vādavinicchayo visuddhimagge vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:53_1: Navame micchāpaṇihitanti sūkaṃ nāma uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindati,
atk-s0305a:53_8: diṭṭhiyāti kammassakatapaññāya ceva maggabhāvanāya ca micchā ṭhapitattā,
atk-s0305a:53_10: Imasmiṃ sutte kammassakatañāṇaṃ magganissitaṃ katvā missakamaggo kathito.
atk-s0305a:59_5: ekaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0305a:59_6: Namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya
atk-s0305a:59_7: saddhesu kulesu paṭiyattaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ upanāmeyya,
atk-s0305a:59_8: taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā namhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā vā gahaṭṭhena vā upasaṅkamitabboti.
atk-s0305a:60_1: Tasmiṃ kira aḍḍhamāse vinetabbo satto nāhosi.
atk-s0305a:60_5: anāgate ca pacchimā janatā ‘satthāpi gaṇaṃ vihāya ekako vihāsi,
atk-s0305a:60_7: tadassā bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti iminā kāraṇena evamāha.
atk-s0305a:60_8: Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ adāsi.
atk-s0305a:60_9: So pātova gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanamukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānādīni sabbakiccāni tasmiṃ khaṇe katvā apagacchati.
atk-s0305a:61_3: Tassa padesena vihāsinti tassa paṭhamābhisambuddhavihārassa padesena.
atk-s0305a:61_4: Tattha padeso nāma khandhapadeso āyatanadhātusaccaindriyapaccayākārasatipaṭṭhānajhānanāmarūpapadeso dhammapadesoti nānāvidho.
atk-s0305a:61_7: Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare yathā nāma pattarajjo rājā attano vibhavasāradassanatthaṃ

atk-s0305a:167_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte therassa phalabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:167_1: Yadā hi thero satisambojjhaṅgaṃ sīsaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0305a:167_4: tadāpi sesā tadanvayā hontīti evaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ attano ciṇṇavasitaṃ dassento thero imaṃ suttaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0305a:171_1: Chaṭṭhe ārāmanissayīti ārāmaṃ nissāya vasanabhāvena ārāmanissayī.
atk-s0305a:171_5: yo pana parappavādaṃ madditvā attano vādaṃ dīpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:171_10: Aññena vā ārāmena pavisitvā aññaṃ ārāmaṃ,
atk-s0305a:171_11: aññena uyyānena aññaṃ uyyānanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a:171_15: evaṃ nibbeṭhana”nti iminā nayena itivādo hoti itivādappamokkhoti etaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0305a:172_3: idāni pucchituṃ na sakkotī”ti ñatvā “na tāva ayaṃ desanā yathānusandhiṃ gatā.
atk-s0305a:172_4: Idāni naṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpessāmī”ti sayameva pucchanto imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:172_8: ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattanti tassa nāmakāyo ca cittañca gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:172_12: Na maṅku hotīti tasmiṃ na maṅku hoti.
atk-s0305a:173_2: indriyasaṃvaro evaṃ bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti ettha evaṃ sucaritapūraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0305a:173_3: imesu tāva chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a:173_4: Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe lobhaṃ uppādentassa manoduccaritaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:173_5: Lobhasahagatena cittena “aho vatidaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti bhaṇantassa vacīduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a:174_1: sotadvārasmiñhi saddārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ saṅkhapaṇavāditūriyabhaṇḍaṃ anāmāsaṃ āmasantassa,
atk-s0305a:174_5: manodvāre paññattivasena dhammārammaṇabhūtaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitādiṃ āmasantassa kāyaduccaritaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:174_6: Saṅkhepato panettha chasu dvāresu kāyavītikkamo kāyaduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a:175_0: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu attano bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhito imāni duccaritāni sucaritaṃ katvā vipariṇāmeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a:175_1: Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acāletvā rūpārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhāpayato manosucaritaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:175_2: vipassanāsahagatena cittena khayadhammaṃ vayadhammanti bhaṇantassa vacīsucaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a:175_5: Evaṃ imāni vitthārato aṭṭhārasa sucaritāni honti.
atk-s0305a:175_6: Saṅkhepato panetthāpi chasu dvāresu kāyasaṃvaro kāyasucaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a:175_9: Evaṃ indriyasaṃvaro tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:176_5: manosaṃvarena tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:176_6: Sakale pana imasmiṃ sutte sucaritamūlakā satipaṭṭhānā lokuttaramissakā,
atk-s0305a:180_1: Navame nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvāti tathāgatassa pātubhāvaṃ vinā na aññasmiṃ kāle uppajjantīti attho.
atk-s0305a:182_0: 191. Dasame nāññatra sugatavinayāti sugatovādaṃ vinā na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0305a:186_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame cattāro iriyāpathe kappentīti yesaṃ cattāro iriyāpathā atthi,
atk-s0305a:188_1: Catutthe tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosīti therassa kira imaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0305a:188_2: sādhukaṃ suṇantassa etadahosi “mayhaṃ pabbajitadivasato sattame divase saccāni paṭivijjhantassa ime bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0305a:188_4: Athassa “niyyānikaṃ vata satthusāsana”nti cintayato lohitaṃ pasīdi,
atk-s0305a:188_6: pokkharapatte patitaudakabindu viya sarīrato rogo vinivattitvā gato.
atk-s0305a:188_7: Tena vuttaṃ “tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosī”ti.
atk-s0305a:188_9: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi janānaṃ pabbatapāde pupphitavisarukkhavātasamphassena uppanno mandasītajaro ābādhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:192_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame kittāvatā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0305a:192_3: kittakena nu kho bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccantīti pucchati.
atk-s0305a:196_1: Chaṭṭhe etadavocāti “imissaṃ parisati nisinno udāyitthero nāma anusandhikusalo bhikkhu atthi,
atk-s0305a:196_2: so maṃ pucchissatīti bhagavatā osāpitadesanaṃ ñatvā desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭessāmī”ti pucchanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a:196_4: Subhāvito hi satisambojjhaṅgo vipulo ca mahaggato ca appamāṇo ca abyāpajjo ca nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:196_8: nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvena byāpādarahitattā abyāpajjho nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:196_9: Taṇhāya pahānā kammaṃ pahīyatīti yaṃ taṇhāmūlakaṃ kammaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0305a:196_11: Kammassa pahānā dukkhanti yampi kammamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0305a:198_6: te vā bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva.
atk-s0305a:198_7: Tampi pana magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:200_0: 210. Navame saṃyojanavinibandhāti saṃyojanasaṅkhātā vinibandhā. Ajjhosānāti pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇā.
atk-s0305a:202_3: avakujjaṃ vayoti udayabbayavasena parivattento sammasantoti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a:202_7: Sace hi thero tasmiṃ samaye sotāpanno,
atk-s0305a:202_11: Tathā tathā viharantanti tena tenākārena viharantaṃ.
atk-s0305a:202_13: Khīṇā jātītiādīhi tathattāyāti adhippetaṃ tathābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a:206_1: Catutthavaggassa tatiye na ca pabhassaranti na ca pabhāvantaṃ.
atk-s0305a:206_4: Ṭhapetvā idha vuttāni cattāri avasesaṃ lohaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:206_11: tadaggeneva te lokiyassāpi lokuttarassāpi upakkilesā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:206_13: Anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇāti kusaladhamme na āvarantīti anāvaraṇā,
atk-s0305a:208_2: Nīvaraṇānañhi abhiṇhuppāde sati antarantarā uppajjamānā paññā dubbalā hoti mandā avisadā.
atk-s0305a:209_0: Pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
atk-s0305a:209_1: Sattabojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti ariyasāvakassa hi sappāyadhammassavanaṃ suṇantassa pañca nīvaraṇā dūre honti.
atk-s0305a:209_2: So sace tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:209_5: tato vuṭṭhāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gato tameva pītiṃ avijahanto pañca nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā visesaṃ nibbattessati.
atk-s0305a:209_6: Tattha asakkontopi yāva sattadivasabbhantarā tameva pītiṃ avijahanto nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā visesaṃ nibbattessatīti idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:209_7: Dhammassavanavasena sakiṃ pītipāmojjapakkhiyā paṭiladdhabojjhaṅgā hi kammārāmatādīni āgamma nassanti,
atk-s0305a:209_8: tathārūpaṃ pana utusappāyādiṃ labhitvā puna uppajjantāpi tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti icceva vuccati.
atk-s0305a:217_1: Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame tisso vidhāti tayo mānakoṭṭhāsā,
atk-s0305a:217_3: Tathā tathā vidahanato hi mānova vidhāti vuccati.
atk-s0305a:219_4: catūhi vā saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā,
atk-s0305a:219_6: “Pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti puññānubhāvena abbhuggatāya vācāya codento cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī,
atk-s0305a:222_0: Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0305a:222_1: sabbeva gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:222_2: Cakkaratanassa ca “ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatī”ti aggho natthi,
atk-s0305a:222_4: Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:222_5: Yasmā pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:225_2: cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvoti ayuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:225_3: Uppannañhi cakkaṃ vattetvā so cakkavattī nāma hotīti nāyuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0305a:225_6: so paṭisandhito pabhuti “cakkavatti pātubhūto”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:225_8: Yo hi esa cakkavattīti laddhanāmo sattaviseso,
atk-s0305a:225_11: Pātubhūtehi pana tehi saddhiṃ paripakke puññasambhāre so saṃyujjati,
atk-s0305a:225_14: Yadā hi lokassa tesu pātubhāvasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:225_16: pacchā itarāni cha pātubhavantīti bahulavacanato cāpi etaṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:225_21: Yasmā yo so puññasambhāro rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ paṭisandhivasena pātubhāvayati,
atk-s0305a:225_24: imāni pana satta ratanānipi pātubhavantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a:225_25: Yatheva hi so puññasambhāro rañño janakahetu,
atk-s0305a:225_28: cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a:226_0: Idāni tesaṃ ratanānaṃ sarūpavasena dassanatthaṃ katamesaṃ sattannaṃ cakkaratanassātiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:226_2: dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ samatthassa cakkaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0305a:226_3: tathā purebhattameva sāgarapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anupariyāyanasamatthassa vehāsaṅgamassa hatthiratanassa,
atk-s0305a:226_5: caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanasamatthassa maṇiratanassa,
atk-s0305a:226_7: yojanappamāṇe padese antopathavigatānaṃ nidhīnaṃ dassanasamatthassa gahapatiratanassa,
atk-s0305a:226_8: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā sakalarajjānusāsanasamatthassa jeṭṭhaputtasaṅkhātassa pariṇāyakaratanassa ca pātubhāvo hotīti.
atk-s0305a:226_10: Vitthārato pana tesaṃ cakkaratanādīnaṃ pātubhāvavidhānaṃ mahāsudassanādīsu suttesu āgatameva.
atk-s0305a:227_1: yatheva hi cakkavattino cakkaratanaṃ sabbaratanānaṃ purecaraṃ,
atk-s0305a:227_4: Cakkavattino ca ratanesu mahākāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ hatthiratanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:227_5: idampi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ mahantaṃ dhammakāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantanti hatthiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:227_7: idampi vīriyasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ sīghaṃ lahu javanti imāya sīghalahujavatāya assaratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:227_10: idampi pītisambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ tāya ekantakusalattā kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamati,
atk-s0305a:227_11: sahajātapaccayādivasena ñāṇālokaṃ dassetīti iminā andhakāravidhamanaālokadassanabhāvena maṇiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:228_4: Cakkavattino gahapatiratanaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe dhanadānena vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:228_6: vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karotīti gahapatiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:228_7: Cakkavattino ca pariṇāyakaratanaṃ sabbatthakiccasampādanena appossukkataṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:228_8: Idampi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ cittuppādaṃ līnuddhaccato mocetvā payogamajjhatte ṭhapayamānaṃ appossukkataṃ karotīti pariṇāyakaratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:228_9: Iti imasmiṃ sutte catubhūmako sabbasaṅgāhikadhammaparicchedo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:230_1: Catutthe eḷamūgoti mukhena vācaṃ nicchāretuṃ sakkontopi dosehi mūgo asampannavacano.
atk-s0305a:234_1: Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāyātiādīsu ayaṃ purimanayato viseso.
atk-s0305a:234_2: Na kevalañhi satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ete vuttappakārāva uppādāya,
atk-s0305a:234_3: uppannānaṃ vā bhāvanāya pāripūriyā paccayā honti,
atk-s0305a:234_5: Aparepi hi cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0305a:234_10: ṭhānanisajjādīsu satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:234_11: Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:236_4: Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:236_7: Tasmā kesādichedanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena ucchādananahāpanena ca ajjhattikavatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:236_9: Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi avisadaṃ aparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0305a:236_10: hoti aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0305a:236_11: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni
atk-s0305a:237_12: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:237_16: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:238_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0305a:238_5: Cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:238_7: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0305a:238_8: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0305a:238_9: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0305a:238_10: vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0305a:239_0: Api ca samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:239_2: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:239_8: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-s0305a:239_11: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā.
atk-s0305a:239_12: Tenāha “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā.
atk-s0305a:239_16: na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a:240_0: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññānaṃ dummedhapuggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:240_2: Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-s0305a:240_4: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:242_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturībhūtakālepi,
atk-s0305a:242_6: Ayameva te bhikkhu kālo”ti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:243_1: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso vīriyassā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:243_5: So ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:244_3: nāpi ‘taṃ nissāya jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti.
atk-s0305a:244_4: Atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti.
atk-s0305a:244_5: Satthārāpi “ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhibahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī”ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0305a:244_6: atha kho “ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamānova samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0305a:244_7: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissasi,
atk-s0305a:244_8: āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati mahāmittattherassa viya.
atk-s0305a:245_1: Tasseva gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0305a:245_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma,
atk-s0305a:245_7: tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0305a:245_9: ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0305a:245_11: “Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi, ammā”ti.
